info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Berks County through 100 PM EDT... At 1236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lenhartsville, or 12 miles east of Schuylkill Haven, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamburg and Lenhartsville. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 31 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
